# fflag

FREAD and/or FWRITE; in the case of a file opened with open(2), fflag corresponds to how the file was opened.

## Fields

- **vp**: File to close.
- **ctx**: Context against which to authenticate close.

items.description: Context against which to authenticate close.
items.name: ctx
